home.seo_description: Small, fast, privacy-friendly online utilities for developers and everyone.
home.subtitle: Fast and simple online tools for everyday.

base64.title: Base64 Encode/Decode
base64.desc: Encode and decode text in Base64.

csvjson.title: CSV ↔ JSON
csvjson.desc: Convert CSV to JSON and JSON to CSV with one click.

uuid.title: UUID Generator
uuid.desc: Generate one or many UUID v4 values.

common.result_placeholder: You will see the result here...

json.title: JSON Formatter
json.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON instantly. Sort keys, copy and download the result.
json.subtitle: Paste your JSON and format or minify it. Shortcuts: {meta}+Enter (Format), {meta}+B (Minify).
json.advice_2: Enable Sort keys to keep objects consistently ordered.
json.advice_3: For very large files, paste in parts or use the upcoming CSV ↔ JSON tool.

base64.title: Base64 Encode / Decode
base64.description: Convert text to and from Base64. UTF-8 friendly. Everything in your browser.
base64.subtitle: Convert text to Base64 and vice versa directly in your browser.
base64.invalid_msg: Invalid input or unsupported Base64 format.
base64.tips_1: Ideal for sending binary data as text.
base64.tips_3: Everything is processed locally, no servers.

csvjson.title: CSV ↔ JSON
csvjson.description: Convert CSV to JSON and JSON to CSV. Auto-detection of delimiter, quotes, headers, and download.
csvjson.subtitle: Convert your data in one click. Everything happens in your browser.
csvjson.json_expected: JSON must be an object, array of objects or array of arrays.

uuid.title: UUID Generator
uuid.description: Generate RFC 4122 version 4 UUIDs right in your browser.
uuid.subtitle: Create one or a batch of UUIDs and copy them easily.

hash.title: Hash Tool
hash.description: Compute cryptographic hashes using Web Crypto in your browser.
hash.subtitle: Supports SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512 over text or files.
hash.drop_hint: Drag & drop a file here, or click to choose

about.title: About
about.body_1: Project in progress. Send ideas or bugs on GitHub.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Toolsy processes everything locally in your browser. No servers, no tracking cookies.
privacy.subtitle: Toolsy is privacy-friendly by design. Your data never leaves your device.
privacy.processing_li1: All tools run fully in your browser (client-side).
privacy.processing_li2: No files or text are uploaded to any server.
privacy.processing_li3: Clipboard actions happen locally with your permission.
privacy.analytics_p: We use privacy-first analytics (e.g. Plausible) to measure page usage in aggregate. No cookies, no personal data.
privacy.contact_p_prefix: Found a bug or have a request? Open an issue on

error.title: Something went wrong
error.subtitle: An unexpected error occurred. Try reloading the page.
